Translations.Text: Niscaya muttakbisakalara babe te'omlokara pratipalakara ocarata ache niyamatapurna jannata
Ami muchalima (anugata)sakalaka aparaadhisakalara darae ganya karaima neki
tomalokara ki haiche, tomaloke e'ito kenekuraa sid'dhanta karaa
tomalokara ocarata kono puthi ache neki ya’ta tomaloke adhyayana karaa
ye, niscaya tomalokara babe tata enekuraa bastu ache yi tomaloke pachanda karaa
athaba tomalokara babe amara lagata kiyamata paryanta balabat thaka enekuraa kono angikara ache neki ye, tomaloke nijara babe yitorae phayacala karaiba se'itorae paba
tumi sihamtaka sodha, sihamtara majata e'i dabira jim'madara kona
athaba sihamtara babe (allahara lagata) bahuto ansidara ache neki? Ache yadi tente sihamte sihamtara ansidarasakalaka upasthita karaka—yadi sihamta satyabadi haya
Se'idina bharaira kalaphuli unmocita karaa ha’ba, se'idina sihamtaka mata ha’ba chajadaha karaibalai, kintu sihamta saksama naha’ba

sihamtara drstisamuha aranata arasthata thakiba, apamane sihamtaka acchanna karaiba athaca yetiya sihamta niraapada achila tetiya sihamtaka mata haichila chajada karaibalai (kintu sihamte chajada karaa nachila)
Eteka erai diya moka arau sihamtaka yisakale e'i bani pratyakhyana karae. Ami sihamtaka lahe lahe enekai dharaima ye, sihamte game'i napaba
Arau ma'i sihamtaka arakasa dima. Niscaya mora kausala atyanta balistha
Tumi sihamtara ocarata paraisramika (binimaya) dabi karaicha neki, yara phalata sihamte rnara karane bharaakraanta hai paraiche
ne sihamtara ocarata gayebara jnana ache, yito sihamte likhi raakhe
eteke tumi tomara pratipalakara adesara apeksata dhairya dharana karaa, arau tumi machara garaakira darae naha’ba, yetiya te'om bisada acchanna arasthata ahbana karaichila
Yadi te'omra pratipalakara anugraha te'omra ocarata ahi napalehemtena, tente te'om lanchita arasthata unmukta praantarata niksipta ha’lehemtena
Tara pichata te'omra pratipalake te'omka manonita karaile arau te'omka satkarmaparaayanasakalara antarbhukta karaile
Arau kaphirasakale yetiya upadesabani (kora'ana) sune tetiya sihamte enekuraa drstirae tomara phale caya yeniba tomaka bagaraa'i diba, arau sihamte kaya, ‘niscaya e'om ejana unmada (baliya)’
Athaca e'i kora'ana kerala bisbabasira babe upadesa
